Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= the outcome of a dispute between two or more parties, decided by a judge or a deity
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to judge|to pass judgment|to vindicate|to rule
Node.definition: = action by which someone gives a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensures that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in relief for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= practices that conform to the laws of God
literally: to yield prosperity; hence: = process by which an area produces abundance of crops ► which results in wealth and prosperity
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God
literally: to crush; hence: = causative action by which a deity inflicts deadly wounds on a human being or animal ◄ as if crushing that person with a heavy object

Node.gloss: to prolong (days) > to stay long|to linger|to last|to live on|to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: literally: to prolong (days); hence: = to stay (in a certain location or position) for an extended period of time|= state in which humans experience fear
= one of the celestial bodies which govern time, seasons and other events on earth, marked by a white and cold light and seen by night
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to fall down|to sink down|to descend
Node.definition: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= water coming down from the sky, which is indispensable for sustaining human life, but can be both refreshing and destructive
= land from which the grass has been recently cut off
= a brief and usually light fall of rain; ≈ regarded as a blessing
meaning unsure; possibly: = process by which water flows down and moistens the ground

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= one of the celestial bodies which govern time, seasons and other events on earth, marked by a white and cold light and seen by night

Node.gloss: to rule|to have charge|to have dominion
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities exercise authority over (other) humans, animals, and areas, often with focus on the manner in which this is done
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
literally: ends of the earth; hence: = the entire earth including its farthest corners

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: to go down on (one's) knees; hence: = action by which humans kneel down in order to show respect

= animal or animal like creature, usually found in desert areas, ► that are hostile to humans; ≈ possibly associated with demons|= group of people that dwells in the desert; ≈ regarded as a potential enemy
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

literally: to lick the dust; hence: = process by which humans are deeply humiliated by being forced to lie prostrate on the ground before those in authority, and, in some cases, having to lick the dust from their feet
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town or region; ◄ probably located at the Iberian peninsula; described as inhabited by descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► famous for its commerce
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH

= objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient
literally: to bring back; hence: = action by which humans give other humans the equivalent for goods received or owed, either in monetary value or in kind
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= country; ◄ exact location unknown; ► known for its wealth and actively involved in trading; regarded as descendants of a man with the same name; its queen visited king Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
= ethnic group ◄ founded by Seba, son of Cush (כּוּשׁ) regarded as a descendant of Ham (חָם)
= amount of goods with monetary value exchanged between two parties ► as gift or as payment for goods
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

= state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God

Node.gloss: to cry out|to cry for help
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to do something that may have a negative effect on someone or something else; ◄ usually caused by an emotion of affection or compassion
= a person or class of people that lack the means to support themselves; ≈ thereby often despised or mistreated, but being under God's protection
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another

= causative action by which humans or deity deliver an individual or group of people from the power of someone else or from difficult circumstances, ► which usually implies that the one who performed the act of deliverance has the right to claim the ones he delivered for himself

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
literally: precious; hence: = state in which a condition or activity is highly appreciated or considered of high significance
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= country; ◄ exact location unknown; ► known for its wealth and actively involved in trading; regarded as descendants of a man with the same name; its queen visited king Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of
Node.definition: = relation denoting that someone performs a certain event for the benefit of someone or something else
literally: all the day; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= large quantity of a substance
collective: = seeds of cultivated cereal; ► used as the main ingredient for bread and related food products; ≈ regarded as an essential condition for life

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
literally: fruit; hence: = products of the land, ◄ depicted as fruit; ≈ regarded as a blessing from God
= process by which a plant produces flowers in the spring as a precursor to the plant's fruit; ≈ associated with strength, prosperity, and splendor

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= any of various plants, herbs, grasses, seed bearing vegetation that can be consumed by human and/or animal

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= state/process by which events last a long time
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
= state in which humans consider themselves favored by a deity

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= to communicate to someone else that you consider him/her or someone else fortunate and blessed by God; ≈ accompanied by an attitude of respect

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= state or process by which a location is dominated by a certain event, to the extent that it dominates everything else, ◄ as if it were completely filled with that event
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= marker expressing a speaker's solemn confirmation of the truth of a statement
= marker expressing a speaker's solemn confirmation of the truth of a statement
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Obed (עֹובֵד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of David (דָּוִד)
